title: Gradle build does not work when an "application.properties" exists at the root of the project

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Describe the bug I am not sure if this is supposed to be supported or not, but by mistake I created a file `application.properties` at the root of my project and the gradle build stop to work with an error: ``` FAILURE: Build failed with an exception. * What went wrong: Could not determine the dependencies of task ':quarkusBuild'. > SRCFG00035: Failed to load resource file://.gradle/daemon/8.3/application.properties ``` What is wired is that the lookup inside the global `gradle` cache makes no sense at all.

### Expected behavior Not sure if a file `application.properties` at the project root is legit or not (I created it by mistake) Failing the build because of the presence of that file is really disturbing. ### Actual behavior Build is failing. ### How to Reproduce? * Create the project with: https://code.quarkus.io/?a=quarkus_issue36767&b=GRADLE * Unzip * Add the file `echo '' > application.properties` * Run `./gradlew build` Project can be seen here: https://github.com/jmini/quarkus-experiments/tree/main/quarkus_issue36767 ### Quarkus version or git rev 3.5.0 (but I have seen it with older java version) ### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`) Output of `./gradlew --version` ``` ------------------------------------------------------------ Gradle 8.3 ------------------------------------------------------------ Build time: 2023-08-17 07:06:47 UTC Revision: 8afbf24b469158b714b36e84c6f4d4976c86fcd5 Kotlin: 1.9.0 Groovy: 3.0.17 Ant: Apache Ant(TM) version 1.10.13 compiled on January 4 2023 JVM: 17.0.5 (Eclipse Adoptium 17.0.5+8) OS: Mac OS X 13.2.1 x86_64 ``` ### Additional information This looks very similar to issue https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/16429, but reproduced differently.
